multi_add_portrait;Lute;MidLeft;Artur;MidRight
speak;Lute;Three Mogall eyeballs, intact...|Four ounces of revenants' bone marrow...|Seventeen gorgon scales, premium quality...
speak;Artur;Lute?|What are you doing with all of those... specimens?
speak;Lute;Cataloging my monster parts collection, of course.|I extracted these during our last encounter with the creatures of darkness.
expression;Lute;Smile
speak;Lute;I've developed a highly efficient extraction method.|While everyone else was focusing on defeating the monsters,|I was securing these valuable research materials.
speak;Artur;I see...|And you collected all of these during battle?|While also fighting?
speak;Artur;Actually, I shouldn't be surprised.|Your capacity for multitasking is rather remarkable.
speak;Lute;Naturally.|It would be inefficient to let such rare specimens go to waste.|Do you know how difficult it is to find intact Mogall eyeballs?
speak;Artur;I can't say that I do.|Nor have I ever wondered about it, truth be told.
speak;Artur;But what exactly are you planning to do with all of these...|parts?
bop_portrait;Lute
speak;Lute;I'm glad you asked!|The Mogall eyeballs contain a rare magical fluid|that, when properly extracted and processed,|can be used to create an enchanted ward.
speak;Lute;And these revenant claws?|When ground and mixed with the proper reagents,|they can be fashioned into a ring that enhances magical power.
speak;Artur;Lute...|Are you certain these crafting methods are... sanctioned?|The church tends to frown upon using dark creatures for magical items.
speak;Lute;The church frowns upon many things that advance magical knowledge.|Besides, I'm not using the parts for dark magic.|I'm repurposing them for beneficial applications.
speak;Lute;Think of it as purifying these tainted materials|and giving them a nobler purpose.
speak;Artur;When you put it that way...|It does sound somewhat reasonable.|Though I'm still not entirely comfortable with it.
expression;Lute;NoSmile
speak;Lute;The process requires time and careful supervision.|One small error could result in a rather unpleasant magical backlash.
speak;Artur;That doesn't sound reassuring at all.
speak;Lute;Which is why I need assistance from someone|who understands magical theory and has steady hands.
expression;Lute;Smile
speak;Lute;I've calculated that you're the only suitable candidate|within our current company.
speak;Artur;Me?|You want me to help you with this?
speak;Lute;Yes.|You're the only one I trust to maintain the necessary focus|and not disrupt the delicate magical balances involved.
expression;Artur;Smile
speak;Artur;I'm...flattered by your confidence in me, Lute.|Though I'm not sure if I should be.
speak;Lute;It's not flattery, just statistical fact.|Your precision with light magic indicates fine control|that would be beneficial to this process.
speak;Lute;So, will you assist me?|Think of the knowledge we'll gain.|The magical items we'll create could help in our coming battles.
speak;Artur;*sigh*|I suppose someone should keep an eye on you|during these experiments.
speak;Artur;If only to ensure you don't accidentally|summon something unpleasant.
expression;Lute;Smile
speak;Lute;Excellent!|I knew you would see the logical benefits.|We'll begin tonight after sunset.
speak;Lute;I've already prepared the necessary containment circles|and purification candles.
speak;Artur;Containment circles?|That doesn't sound ominous at all...
speak;Lute;Merely a precaution.|The probability of anything escaping is only 3.7%.|And if something does go wrong, you're quite proficient with holy magic.
speak;Artur;That's not as reassuring as you seem to think it is, Lute.
speak;Lute;Oh! I almost forgot.|You should wear these protective gloves.|Mogall eye fluid can cause some interesting skin reactions.
expression;Artur;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Artur;Interesting... skin reactions?|What kind of reactions exactly?
speak;Lute;Nothing permanent.|Well, mostly not permanent.|The purple spots usually fade within a week.
speak;Artur;I suppose I did agree to help...|Though I'm already beginning to regret it.
expression;Lute;Smile
speak;Lute;Don't worry, Artur.|This will be a fascinating learning experience for both of us.|And afterwards, I'll have new data for my monster compendium!
expression;Artur;Smile
speak;Artur;Very well.|Just promise me we won't be creating anything|that Father Moulder would need to exorcise later.
speak;Lute;I make no promises.|But I calculate a 78.3% chance of complete success!
expression;Lute;Smile
speak;Lute;Thank you, Artur.|You truly are an invaluable research assistant.
speak;Artur;Assistant?|I thought I was supervision.
speak;Lute;Same difference!|Now, help me carry these jars.|And be careful with that one.|It blinks sometimes.
